name: Costco Chaos
description:
Navigate through the chaotic store without any labeled items within five minutes. It's not a trip to Costco without the many different shoppers getting in your way. Make it to the checkout with all of the items on time and don't die!

DEVELOPERS:
  • Joseph Terribile 
  • Kayla Marcantonio 
  • Nathan Lim 
  • Sofia Montana
CREDITS:

MUSIC:  "Upbeat Theme Loop.wav" by Mrthenoronha on Freesound.org https://freesound.org/people/Mrthenoronha/sounds/506893/ (CC BY-NC 3.0)

OOF SOUND: https://freesound.org/people/xtrgamr/sounds/257780/

POWERUP SLOW DOWN SOUND: https://freesound.org/people/PatrickLieberkind/sounds/392408/
